org.eng.aisp.storage

Interface ISoundStorage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDeleteableItemStorage<SoundRecording>, IFieldedItemStorage<SoundRecording>, IIndexedItemIterableFactory<SoundRecording>, IIndexedSoundIterableFactory, IItemStorage<SoundRecording>, INamedItemStorage<SoundRecording>, INamedSerializableStorage<SoundRecording,SoundRecordingMetaData>, IReadOnlyStorage<SoundRecording>, ISerializableStorage<SoundRecording,SoundRecordingMetaData>

    public interface ISoundStorage
extends INamedSerializableStorage<SoundRecording,SoundRecordingMetaData>, IIndexedSoundIterableFactory
    Interface to needed to store SoundRecording. Extends are added to support WAV formatted data.
    Author:
    dawood

      • writeMetaDataSoundZip

        void writeMetaDataSoundZip(List<String> ids,
                           OutputStream output)
                    throws StorageException
        Collect the sounds with the given ids as .wav files into the stream representing a zip file and include a metadata.csv file that specifies the labels for the sounds. The names of the files in the zip are either the name assigned in storage (with additional indexing if duplicate names are found) or the id of the sound if a name is not assigned. In either case .wav is appended if not present.
        Parameters:
        ids -
        output - stream to which zipped bytes are written. Caller must close the stream.
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • getMetaDataSoundZip

        byte[] getMetaDataSoundZip(List<String> ids)
                    throws StorageException

        Parameters:
        ids -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • addMetaDataSoundZip

        List<String> addMetaDataSoundZip(InputStream zipStream)
                          throws StorageException,
                                 IOException
        Add 0 or more SoundRecordings contained in the given byte array representing a zip of wav files and a metadata.csv
        Parameters:
        zipStream - the input stream containing the bytes to unzip. Caller must close the stream.
        Returns:
        a list of ids, one for each sound added to storage.
        Throws:
        StorageException - if all sounds could not be added.
        IOException - if zippedSounds is not a zip.

      • addMetaDataSoundZip

        Throws:
